sentences.en: Ageing is accompanied by a slow degeneration of his mental faculties.
sentences.cn: 他随着年纪增长,智力逐渐衰退.

sentences.en: Conclusion: DTI is more accurate than MRI in diagnosing Wallerian degeneration.
sentences.cn: 结论: DTI技术 通过测量FA值 及其比值及神经纤维束的三维重建,较常规MRI更为准确客观地诊断Wallerian变性.

sentences.en: He had lost his sight as a result of age - related macular degeneration.
sentences.cn: 他因年龄偏大导致的斑点加重而失明.

sentences.en: Histopathologically, the basic change is cell degeneration.
sentences.cn: 病理组织学检查, 基本变化是细胞变性.

sentences.en: Improves eye health and reduces the risk of age - related macular degeneration.
sentences.cn: 促进眼睛健康,减低老年患黄斑部退化的风险.

sentences.en: Inadequate cell nutrition around vessels causes degeneration of tunica adventitia.
sentences.cn: 血管周围细胞的营养不足,引起外膜的变性.

sentences.en: Indications: Cataract, Conjunctivitis, Myopia, Presbyopia , Eye sight degeneration and other eye disease.
sentences.cn: 适应症: 白内障 、 结膜炎、视力不足 、 近视 、 老花眼、视力减退及眼部疾病.

sentences.en: Instead, if you do not use your mental faculties, you accelerate the degeneration of cells and the loss of your cognitive abilities.
sentences.cn: 相反，要是你不经常使用你的精神能力，你就会加速这些细胞的退化甚至会导致你的认知能力的丧失。

sentences.en: Intensive farming in the area has caused severe degeneration of the land.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的集约化农业使得土壤严重贫瘠化。

sentences.en: Objective To observe the genetic factor in age - related macular degeneration ( ARMD ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨老年黄斑变性 ( ARMD ) 是否存在遗传因素.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo observe the ultrastructural alterations photoreceptor in inherited retinal degeneration in rats.
sentences.cn: 目的观察遗传性视网膜变性大鼠视细胞超微结构改变.

sentences.en: Over-use of those drugs, coupled with poor diet, leads to physical degeneration.
sentences.cn: 过量使用那些药物再加上饮食缺乏营养，导致健康状况恶化。

sentences.en: The degeneration of mitochondria is one of the earliest events in pollen abortion.
sentences.cn: 线粒体的退化是花粉败育中最早发生的现象之一.

sentences.en: The most striking change in the tubules is hydropic degeneration of the epithelium.
sentences.cn: 肾小管的常见病就是上皮细胞的水肿变形.

sentences.en: This is a late change in the degeneration of cells.
sentences.cn: 这是细胞衰退的晚期变化.

sentences.en: This shows the degeneration of the spirit of tolerance and self - discipline .
sentences.cn: 这表明了忍耐和 自律 精神的倒退.

words.tran_cn: 退化；[物] 简并；堕落；退步

trans.tran_en: the process of becoming worse or less acceptable in quality or condition
